entries.journal_entry_description: To truly become attuned to the Force, you need to learn all you can about how it works.
entries.journal_entry_title: Learning the Ways of the Force
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Nos'lyn told you about a guard that needs to be calmed down before he kills someone. Go to the Cantina and talk to the guard.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Talk to the Angry Guard in the Cantina
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Very good. That guard will be fine when he allows time to heal his grief. Now I want you to use your skills to destroy 7 troublesome droids on the lower level. Notice that disabling them does not disrupt the flow of the Force.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Use the Elevator to go down to the Droid Repair Center. Nos'lyn wants you to go hunt droids.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Head Down to the Droid Repair Center
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The Droid Repair Center on the lower lever is a good place to practice your skills and learn to feel what happens when a droid 'dies'. It will give you a comparison for when you go up against live foes.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Disable 7 Droids in the Droid Repair Center
entries.task05_comm_message_text: You have done well. Now you must learn the delicate balance of life and death. Go to the Atrium and kill 7 Tanc Mites.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: You need to head to the main level and then go to the Atrium.
entries.task06_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Main Level
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: You need go to the Atrium.
entries.task07_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Atrium
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Nos'lyn wants you to learn about the balance of life and death. Kill 7 Tanc Mites. Feel what happens to life as it leaves even the lowliest creature.
entries.task08_journal_entry_title: Kill 7 Tanc Mites in the Atrium
entries.task10_comm_message_text: Did you feel the ebb and flow of the life force? Now I want you to take on a more difficult foe. Do not be discouraged if you fall temporarily. Be patient and persistent and kill the Tanc Mite Queen in the Atrium.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: You are to find the Tanc Mite Queen and defeat her.
entries.task11_journal_entry_title: Find and Kill Tanc Mite Queen
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: You need to return to Nos'lyn. Take the elevator to the main level.
entries.task12_journal_entry_title: Take the Elevator to the Main Level
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: Nos'lyn will complete your training in the Close Combat Training room.
entries.task13_journal_entry_title: Talk to Nos'lyn in the Close Combat Training Room.
